mutants.code:
import re
from collections import Counter

def filter_and_count_words(text):
    text = re.sub('', ' ', text.lower())
    words = text.split()
    words = [word for word in words if not re.fullmatch('[ivxlcdm]+', word)]
    word_counts = Counter(words)
    sorted_words = sorted(word_counts, key=word_counts.get)
    return sorted_words

import re
from collections import Counter

def filter_and_count_words(text):
    text = re.sub('[^a-zA-Z0-9\\s]', '', text.lower())
    words = text.split()
    words = [word for word in words if not re.fullmatch('[ivxlcdm]+', word)]
    word_counts = Counter(words)
    sorted_words = sorted(word_counts, key=word_counts.get)
    return sorted_words

mutants.original_line: words = [word for word in words if not re.fullmatch(r'[ivxlcdm]+', word)]
mutants.mutated_line: words = [word for word in words if not re.fullmatch('', word)]
mutants.code:
import re
from collections import Counter

def filter_and_count_words(text):
    text = re.sub('[^a-zA-Z0-9\\s]', ' ', text.lower())
    words = text.split()
    words = [word for word in words if not re.fullmatch('', word)]
    word_counts = Counter(words)
    sorted_words = sorted(word_counts, key=word_counts.get)
    return sorted_words
